kannada_original: ನಿನ್ನ ಬಾವಿಯ ನೀರು ಒಣಗಿ ಹೋಗುವ ತನಕ
english_transliteration: Ninna bāviya nīru oṇagi hōguva tanaka
english_translation: Until the water in your well dries up

kannada_original: ಬರದು ಅರಿವಿಗೆ ನಿನಗೆ ಜಲದ ಬೆಲೆ ಪೂರ್ಣ.
english_transliteration: Baradu arivige ninage jalada bele pūrṇa.
english_translation: The full value of water will not come to your knowledge.
If the stomach is not hungry, will it know the value of taste?
If there is shortage, the value is high! – Muddu Rama.
